properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kristu Mshinda, Kristu mfalme,
Kristu Krsitu mtawala.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Msifuni Bwana,
enyi mataifa yote,
msifuni,
enyi watu wote.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Maana fadhili zake
kwetu ni kubwa sana,
na uaminifu wake
wadumu milele.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana,
na Roho Mtakatifu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kama mwanzo na sasa
na siku zote,
na milele, amina.
